divs: Sighting DetailsWe were at work in are workshop i whent outside on my teabreak, and looked up in the air i saw large black object moveing up and down slowly, i called my workmate out and he had his camera which he put into video mode ,It then started to move up faster it was big you could see it going though cloud as big as a lage jet i would say.It then moved so high we could no longer see it.
Summary: Large cylinder object on camera hovers above our workshop.
trends: There have been 91 other sightings in London
There were no other sightings in London on or around June 24th 2005
This sighting has never been favorited.
